description: yeehaa is a dedicated professional with a strong background in digital innovation and technology strategy. He demonstrates expertise in software development, data analytics, and project management. Notably, he authored 'Across Space And Time,' exploring ecosystems in human organizations, and curated 'Groom Your Ecosystem,' emphasizing strategic vision and adaptability. His work bridges technical expertise with business acumen, driving successful tech initiatives across Europe.
blurb: Explores the evolution of the term 'ecosystem' from its biological roots to its expanded meaning in human organizations, advocating for 'Ecosystem Architecture' to foster decentralized communities.
